metadata.title: Loot Weapon Mine!
metadata.author: CURA
metadata.description:
Loot Weapon Mine adds a contraband shop to the Storage interface whenever the Storage event is available. Unlock new shelves by completing faction Transport achievements or defeating Multiverse renegades, then spend your single-per-run allowance on a weapon, drone, augment, or specialist crew member. Rarity-based pricing (Transport ~1.5x, Renegade ~2.5x, Chaos Renegade ~4x) keeps choices meaningful, and the locker seals once a purchase is made.
中文简介： Loot Weapon Mine 会在“仓库”界面新增一个永远开放的战利品商店，只要仓库事件出现就能随时浏览。完成各派系的 Transport 成就或击败 Multiverse 变元者即可解锁更多物品，每次运行仍然只能购买一件武器、无人机、插件或特殊船员。Transport / Renegade / Chaos Renegade 商品价格分别约为原价 1.5 倍、2.5 倍、4 倍。
Requirements: - FTL: Multiverse + Hyperspace - Load after Multiverse (compatible with Judge Boon Selector)
